x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
Qatar - Reservations - defaulting to Map view breaks Default Floor Plan functionality
When you save the setting, the defaults changes, however when you close and reopen the Reservation app, the map does not go to the default you set.
Reproduction Steps :
1. Open Reservation app 2. Select setting option (top right gear) 3. Set floor default to a floor on this instance, and it's appropriate site. 4. Select saved 5. Reopen Reservation app and default doesn't save.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Reservation - Map does not go to default
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Fix version for this issue is Romania but the resolution is also included in Qatar Patch 3. Reach out to Technical Engineering team mentioning "SFM-10119" in case comments.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.sys_name: Reservation - Map does not go to default

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_77dffee4dbc999105f598b05059619b8
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Qatar - Reservations - defaulting to Map view breaks Default Floor Plan functionality

When you save the setting, the defaults changes, however when you close and reopen the Reservation app, the map does not go to the default you set. 


Reproduction Steps :

1. Open Reservation app
2. Select setting option (top right gear)
3. Set floor default to a floor on this instance, and it's appropriate site.
4. Select saved
5. Reopen Reservation app and default doesn't save.

</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Reservation - Map does not go to default</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>Fix version for this issue is Romania but the resolution is also included in Qatar Patch 3. Reach out to Technical Engineering team mentioning "SFM-10119" in case comments.</remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();
var queryString = "name=Connected Workplace^active=true^versionSTARTSWITH16^ORversionSTARTSWITH17^ORversionSTARTSWITH18.";
var checkVersion = new GlideRecord("sys_scope");
checkVersion.addEncodedQuery(queryString);
checkVersion.query();
if (checkVersion.next()) {
	util.handleOutput('For Qatar version and earlier, reservations has an issue where you cannot select a default map view. It will reset back to nothing after closing Reservations and re-opening. Fix version for this issue is Romania but the resolution is also included in Qatar Patch 3. Reach out to Technical Engineering team mentioning "SFM-10119" in case comments. ', 'Warning', 'Reservation');
}

]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Harshal.Sonawane@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-29 12:50:47</sys_created_on><sys_id>77dffee4dbc999105f598b05059619b8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Reservation - Map does not go to default</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_77dffee4dbc999105f598b05059619b8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:28</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
